doc:
Johnny Vegas https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Johnny_Vegas 0 Michael Pennington (born 5 September 1970), known professionally as Johnny Vegas, is an English actor and comedian, known for his formerly portly figure and his alter-egos angry rants, surreal humour and high husky voice.His television roles have included playing Al in the ITV Digital and PG Tips adverts, drug dealer Moz in the BBC black comedy Ideal, Geoff Maltby in the ITV comedy series Benidorm and Eric Agnew in the BBC sitcom Still Open All Hours. Michael_Pennington ( born_5_September_1970 ) , known professionally as Johnny_Vegas , is an_English_actor_and_comedian , known for his_formerly_portly_figure and his_alter-egos angry_rants , surreal_humour and high_husky_voice.His_television_roles have_included_playing Al in the_ITV_Digital and PG_Tips_adverts , drug_dealer Moz in the_BBC_black_comedy_Ideal , Geoff_Maltby in the_ITV_comedy_series_Benidorm_and_Eric_Agnew in the_BBC_sitcom Still Open All_Hours .
